title: I have a Backlog in maths, what is my next step
content: I got a backlog in maths no way i did not pass , what are my options currently, should I apply for reval or take a L and write the backlog exam

comments.body: Apply for re-evaluation, you might pass with another round of correction. But as usual, hope for the best and prepare for the worst. Details about backlog exams are in FAQs.
I have not gotten the option to see the paper yet or apply for re eval , and is there any chance of grade curve?

You'll get details about applying for re-evaluation in a few days (2-3 usually). There will be a form you need to fill up with more details. 

And no, your current grade will be your final grade if you don't apply for re-evaluation. The grade you have now is after all adjustments have been made to the grade mapping.
Oh understood thanks a lot for the help
Bro even i was extremely confident that i would get A grade but i got B in maths, i will definitely apply for re-eval

btw do they tell us if they did use relative grading for the score?  
because on the site it does not talk about relative grading or anything right now.
Your grade sheet *may* include it. It won't be on the website
Next step should be from the 7th floor
